name: Bad Bats ! Html5
description: This is my first game ever. Uploading this for practicing, and figuring out how things are done. In the heartbeast's tutorial(https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9FzW-m48fn2SlrW0KoLT4n5egNdX-W9a )he completes basic game play. I watched tons of other tutorials and completed it. Just roam around have fun.  There are only two levels.
